ingredients.content: 100 g Parmesan cheese, cut in pieces
150 g yellow pepper, cut in pieces
150 g red pepper, cut in pieces

preparations.content: Place Parmesan in mixing bowl and grate <b>10 sec/speed 10<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place butter and flour in mixing bowl and heat <b>3 min/100°C/speed 2<b>.
Add yellow and red peppers and chop <b>8 sec/speed 7<b>.
Add water, stock cube, herb salt, paprika and black pepper and cook <b>10 min/95°C/speed 2<b>.
Add reserved Parmesan and cream and blend <b>40 sec/speed 4<b> <b>-8, increasing speed gradually<b>. Adjust seasoning and serve hot.
